column1: # This configuration helps reduce false positives in security scanning
# 10021 - X-Content-Type-Options Header Missing - we're fixing this
# 10049 - Storable and Cacheable Content - we're fixing this
# 90004 - Insufficient Site Isolation Against Spectre Vulnerability - we're fixing this
# 90005 - Sec-Fetch-Dest Header is Missing - browser-specific, may not be critical for APIs
